description.details: While working at Givex I got to experience developing robust applications using Python, PostgreSQL, Django, JavaScript and jQuery. I would develop new features for applications which are used by millions of customers around the globe. I partook in the design, development, and deployment of new features related to gift cards and loyalty cards.

Some of the other things which I was responsible for were things like server management, Unit Test Monitoring, Error Monitoring, creating scripts for data management, code quality reviewing, and even translating into French when it was requested.
Working at Givex helped me solidify the foundation I built while at University and finetune my understanding of the SDLC.
At Fuzzex, I was part of a small development team working on multiple mobile applications. Fuzzex was one of the first companies to bring Preferans and Tangram to the mobile market.

I got to experience what it's like to work in a start-up environment, with an agile scrum approach to testing. It also taught me the importance of utilizing various tools and using  certain design patterns when it makes sense.
